http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vqUdqn3ei5g  [Renard - Terminal] 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tU-VA3BYzmg [Ghosts ''n Stuff - Deadmau5]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H5STvxzCOsE [Moonwalker - Wilkinson]

 Red means i'm listening to them a lot lately.

I fucking love dubstep, saw Skrillex and Feed Me when they came through.

What I despise more than anything else are the fans.
Next to none appreciate the origins of dub, or even know where it came from.
Dubstep couldn't exist without dub, reggae, house, ska, or even trance.

If you only like techno, that's all well and good, but at least give someone like Skream a listen once in a while.
And for the love of fuck, I'd better never see "LOL tht drop was filther thn fingerin ur sis and finding ur dads weddin ring," from any of you.

>> And for the love of fuck, I'd better never see "LOL tht drop was filther thn fingerin ur sis and finding ur dads weddin ring," from any of you. 
More like:
"The drop was dirtier than my browsing history."
